entities.name: Dudley
entities.description: Dudley is being threatened by a demon mentor.

entities.name: Harry

entities.name: demon mentor

entities.name: silver stag
entities.description: The silver stag is a magical creature summoned by Harry to attack the demon mentor.

relationships.description: Harry attacks the demon mentor with the silver stag.
The silver stag is summoned by Harry to attack the demon mentor.
